snippet.title: A NEAR DAWN // Adventure Game Trailer
snippet.description:
OUR KICKSTARTER IS LIVE! - http://kck.st/2z8iRTE
PLAY THE PROLOGUE on ITCH.IO! - https://goo.gl/AatVAh
STEAM - https://goo.gl/xhR1VN
GOOGLE PLAY (Android) - https://goo.gl/nTndNC

A NEAR DAWN is a dark, humorous psychological thriller adventure game from Far-off Daydream Games, written and directed by Leonid Pilchin. The PROLOGUE is free to download on Itch.io, Steam, or Google Play! We will be launching a KickStarter to help get support for this project on October 24th, 2017!

Website: https://goo.gl/chb7LE
Twitter: https://goo.gl/sMppNV
Instagram: https://goo.gl/K7bJ2V


Original song "Hear You Scream" by HANIA
Patreon: https://www.Patreon.com/hania 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/TheHaniaShow
